abstract: Swiss Federal Office of Justice approves extradition of Rafael Esquivel, former president of Venezuela’s soccer federation, to the United States; Esquivel is among seven men arrested on corruption charges in Switzerland.
lead_paragraph: Swiss officials said Wednesday they had approved the extradition of Rafael Esquivel, the former president of the Venezuelan’s soccer federation, to the United States.

headline.main: FIFA Official’s Extradition Approved on Eve of Meeting in Zurich
headline.print_headline: Official’s Extradition Is Approved Before Big FIFA Meeting

snippet: Swiss officials said Wednesday they had approved the extradition of Rafael Esquivel, the former president of the Venezuelan’s soccer federation, to the United States.
